data.description:
Master figure drawing in your own virtual studio. Explore over 200 lifelike models, customize your lighting, and elevate your art with the power of virtual reality. 

ùêÖùêÑùêÄùêìùêîùêëùêÑùêí

‚Ä¢Drawing
Sketch in 2D or 3D with pressure-sensitive strokes for dynamic thickness and shading.

‚Ä¢Mixed Reality
Activate passthrough to blend virtual models with your physical drawing space allowing you to draw with real pen and paper.

‚Ä¢Models
Choose from 200+ models, including 3D-scanned human figures, skeletons, animals, statues, and anatomy guides.

‚Ä¢Guides
Learn to life draw with a series of figure drawing guides by Stan Prokopenko of Proko.com.

‚Ä¢Modes
Freeform Mode: Select from 200+ poses with customizable settings.
Guided Mode: Engage in an hour-long drawing session with a single model.
Open Studio: A blank canvas for freehand drawing.

‚Ä¢Sketchbook
Gesture VR records each session in a digital sketchbook. Switch between the pages of your sketchbook with the arrows found on the paper pad.

‚Ä¢Multiplayer
Join up to three artists for a communal drawing session.

‚Ä¢Sharing
Capture and export your 2D artwork as PNGs for sharing online.
(Android\data\com.NickLaddVrArtandAnimation.GestureVR\files\Images)

changelog.change_log: Fixed bug in which eraser passed through page
Added over 140 new models, new rotation system and visuals

-Added a small set of new female models while we work on reintegrating larger collection
-Added Dog model to Misc
-Changed censor material

- Removed models acquired from 3DScanStore
- Fixed tutorial section

-Fixed an issue that caused the music playlist to end.

-Corrected brush tip position.

-Fixed an issue where models in the spawner would sometimes get switched around.
